description:
Shokudaikiri Mitsutada and Tsurumaru Kuninaga are concerned with helping Ookurikara, who has just manifested, getting acclimated to the citadel. Shokudaikiri Mitsutada comes up with an idea after seeing the actions of Kasen Kanesada, Uguisumaru and the others. Meanwhile, tachi, "Mikazuki Munechika" suddenly manifests in the smithing room. While the Sword Warriors are wrapped up in the joy of one of the Five Great Swords of Japan appearing, dispatch orders come down from Master.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 皐月 優しいは, 強い
